distantfriends.configuration.addWhitelis: Add the players from the whitelist to the Friends list [default: true]
distantfriends.configuration.friends.too: A list of users who can be chosen when it spawns a distant friend
distantfriends.configuration.playerMobsC: Add players from a Player Mobs whitelist to the Friends list [default: false]
distantfriends.configuration.title: Distant Friends Config
